title: Can we give Blitz the ability to wave his arms frantically and say "DANGER DANGER"
body: Like the Lost in Space Robot. I find myself running away as {{champion:53}}  a lot and that would be pretty darn hilarious.

replies.body: It should be when his passive is triggered.

tfw you spend too much time on tumblr and this is the first thing you think of when you see "triggered"
http://www.amerika.org/wp-content/uploads/triggered-600x524.png
This is obviously what's supposed to happen upon activation of Blitz' W when facing away from bad guys!
Well that would be funny. Maybe make this his homeguard animation if he gets visually reworked?
I've wanted a Lost in Space skin or a Forbidden Planet skin for Blitz for a long time.

But who would be Robinson? XD
Perhaps graves holding a space gun making 'pew' noises?
